trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanged" /> events.

When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> that raises the event is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> property is the control that owns the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> 발생 시키는 이벤트 설정 되어 있는지에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 컨트롤의는 <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> 속성은 소유 하는 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that is not in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> property is `null` and you should use the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.StateGroupsRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> 에 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 에 있지 않은 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> 속성은 `null` 사용 하 여 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.StateGroupsRoot%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that is transitioning states.
The element that is transitioning states if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" /> is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" />이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" />에 있는 경우 변환 중인 요소를 나타내고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that is not in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> property is `null` and you should use the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.StateGroupsRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> 에 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 에 있지 않은 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.Control%2A> 속성은 `null` 사용 하 여 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs.StateGroupsRoot%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned to.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 전환되고 있거나 전환된 후의 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned to.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 전환되고 있거나 전환된 후의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned from.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 전환되고 있거나 전환되기 전의 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The state that the element is transitioning to or has transitioned from.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 전환되고 있거나 전환되기 전의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root element that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateManager" />.
The root element that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateManager" />.
